"step_by_step_thinking": "The question is asking if retinol binding protein 4 (RBP4) is an adipokine. An adipokine is a type of protein secreted by adipose tissue that can have various functions, including regulating metabolism and energy homeostasis. The document on retinol deficient diet decreases binding activity of testicular fatty acid-binding protein also does not suggest any connection between RBP4 and adipokines.

This study does not provide any information related to adipose tissue or adipokines.
